title: Health Conversations
description: Practice talking about health problems and giving advice.

sentences.text: I need to make a doctor's appointment.
How long have you been feeling sick?
You shouldn't go to work when you're sick.
I have to take this medicine three times a day.
sentences.translation: 이 약을 하루에 세 번 먹어야 해요.
sentences.tips: 'have to'로 의무를 표현하고 숫자를 명확하게 말하세요.

sentences.text: I'm feeling better now, thank you.
You should drink lots of water and rest.
Do I have to come back for a checkup?

items: Did you pronounce medical terms correctly?
Did you use appropriate tone for giving advice?
Did you stress key words (should, have to)?
Did you speak without long pauses?
Did you use 'should' and 'have to' correctly?
Did you use the right grammar?
